title: Glitch Sound Effects - THE GLITCH 2
longDescription:
Youtube Demo: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bdnogNWa1WI


With THE GLITCH 2 sound library Sound Response brings you the second installment of totally twisted, mangled, glitchy, twitchy sonic madness! Great for sound experimentation and exploration, these glitch sound effects often turn out to be an effective source of inspiration in sound design and music production.


These glitch sound effects are always useful as a sound design tool for video games, movies, trailers, and other cinematic projects. You can either use them as they are, or you can unlock their full potential by combining and layering them for creation of all sorts of futuristic and hi-tech sounds, mechanisms, robot sound effects, malfunctions, and other stuttering, glitchy sci-fi sound effects. If youâ€™re looking to expand your sound effects collection and sound design audio arsenal with high quality glitch sound effects, THE GLITCH 2 sound library is a must have!


If you like the sound of THE GLITCH 2 then be sure to check out the first installment - THE GLITCH and also Signal Interferences, and Sci-Fi Gadgets sound libraries!


THE GLITCH 2 Sound Effects List
technicalDetails:
Technical Details

Number of Audio Waves: 341

Number of Audio Cues: 341

Sample Rate/Bit Rate: 44.1 kHz, 16bit Stereo WAVs

Do Sound FX Loop: No
